As the number of overweight and obese women entering pregnancy has increased [70–72], pregnancy-related 
complications are seen as important women’s health issues [43,44,73,74]. Maternal obesity before and 
after conception increases the risk of a wide range of pregnancy-related complications [32]. Pre-pregnancy
